page.title: 04Recreation
page.content:
{The Etonettes I joined the Etonettes Marching Band in 1983. I joined a week before the carnival and the next week I was playing my flute and marching with the band. To join the band you have to pass 2 tests - a drill test and a music test. If you don't pass these then you have a fortnight (two weeks) in which to practice your music and marching and then you take your tests again. If you don't pass, you have to wait a year before trying again. After playing the flute in the band for a year, I went on to play a clarinet.
{The Abbey Allotments Many people rent allotments. They are strips of land, away from the houses, where people grow fruit and vegetables. The Abbey Allotments are
